name: Dice Jumpers
description:
Dice Jumpers is a game where you roll a dice to get a certain amount of jumps, and try to get as high up as possible. You will earn powerups, such as reroll, which will let you get even higher up! This was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, for the theme, Roll of the Dice!

Credits

Programming - MrDaveDev

Art - MrDaveDev

Music - Noah (aka. DrummerDuck)
